summary: A young man abandons his family for a solitary life of fly-fishing. His goal was to find his own way in the fishing world and thereby find himself and love.
cast: Zach Gilford|Amber Heard|William Hurt|Dallas Roberts|Kathleen Quinlan|William Devane|Drew Barrios|Gabby Brooks|Keagan Brooks|Landon Brooks|Nikki Deloach|Natasha Duvall|Evan Geer|Gattlin Griffith|Breanna Aleigh Grimes|David Richard Heath|Alex Hurt|Catherine Lassesen|Christopher McCafferty|Allen Nause|Daniel Nelson|Elijah Nelson|Brendan Robinson|Lauren Selman|Robert Zorn
title: El río de los sueños
